sections.title: Battle Herald (Class Overview)
sections.description: Overview of the Battle Herald class including role, alignment, hit die, and starting wealth.

sections.title: Weapon and Armor Proficiencies (Battle Herald)
sections.description: Battle heralds gain no proficiency with any weapons or armor beyond what they had before taking the class.

sections.title: Inspiring Command (Ex) (Battle Herald)
sections.description: The battle herald's primary ability allowing them to issue tactical commands that provide bonuses to allies, including inspire courage and various specialized commands with scaling action economy.

sections.title: Against All Odds (Ex) (Battle Herald)
sections.description: Grants a limited number of allies the benefits of the Combat Reflexes feat based on the battle herald's inspiring command bonus.

sections.title: Immortal Dare (Ex) (Battle Herald)
sections.description: Grants a limited number of allies the benefits of the Diehard feat based on the battle herald's inspiring command bonus.

sections.title: Inherited Song (Battle Herald)
sections.description: Allows the battle herald to select one bardic performance or raging song from another class and use it as an inspiring command with stacking levels.

sections.title: Improved Leadership (Ex) (Battle Herald)
sections.description: Adds the battle herald's inspiring command bonus to their Leadership feat score.

sections.title: Voice of Authority (Ex) (Battle Herald)
sections.description: Provides bonuses to Diplomacy and Intimidate checks and helps allies hear commands, while stacking with cavalier tactician abilities.

sections.title: Easy March (Ex) (Battle Herald)
sections.description: Allows allies within 60 feet to hustle or force march without penalties for a number of hours based on the inspiring command bonus.

sections.title: Inspire Greatness (Ex) (Battle Herald)
sections.description: Grants the ability to use inspire greatness as an inspiring command, affecting an increasing number of creatures as the battle herald levels up.

sections.title: Banner (Ex) (Battle Herald)
sections.description: Allows the battle herald to fly a battle standard identical to a cavalier's banner ability, with stacking levels for bonuses.

sections.title: Teamwork Feat (Battle Herald)
sections.description: Grants a bonus teamwork feat and allows using cavalier tactician ability to share it with allies as a move or swift action.

sections.title: Demanding Challenge (Ex) (Battle Herald)
sections.description: Functions identically to the 12th-level cavalier demanding challenge ability.

sections.title: Persistent Commands (Ex) (Battle Herald)
sections.description: Allows inspiring commands to continue for additional rounds based on Charisma bonus when the battle herald becomes incapacitated.

sections.title: Inspire Last Stand (Ex) (Battle Herald)
sections.description: Grants allies within 30 feet the Diehard feat and inspire courage bonuses while at negative hit points.

sections.title: Complex Commands (Ex) (Battle Herald)
sections.description: Allows maintaining multiple inspiring commands simultaneously and one bardic performance in addition to commands, each with separate costs.
